A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This franchise deserved better.

At certain points in the film\, I felt like I was watching The Fosters\, but in space.   You know\, the episode where Jesus or Carlos or whoever has a disagreement with his two mommies. Except in this episode\, his mommies are hateful and vindictive and beat the sh**t  out of him\, and then purple hair mommy needlessly offs herself. (As Leia watches purple hairs burnt and mangled body  cartwheeling into oblivion - " do you think we should have told her about the auto pilot?").

  That about sums it up.
